'''Otto''' is an [[NPC]] located in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]]. He can be found guarding the entrance to the [[Favonius Cathedral]].

During the Archon Quest "[[Venti's New Plan]]," he will instead stand guard at the entrance to the Cathedral's basement at daytime.

===Appearance===
Otto wears one of the standard uniforms of the Knights of Favonius. The uniform consists of a black long-sleeve shirt and horse riding pants with white plate armor worn on top. However, the poleyns, greaves, and sabatons are black. The Knights of Favonius crest decorates the breastplate.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Otto:''' Hello, traveler. Welcome to Mondstadt.
:{{DIcon}} What are you doing here?
::'''Otto:''' As you can see, I am a Mondstadt guard.
::'''Otto:''' Protecting the people, travelers, and merchants is my duty.
:{{DIcon}} Is there anything worth visiting in Mondstadt?
::'''Otto:''' If it's your first time here, I recommend visiting the Mondstadt Cathedral.
::'''Otto:''' If you're tired, go have some of Mondstadt's famous wine at a tavern called "Angel's Share."
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Otto:''' Goodbye, traveler.
::'''Otto:''' May the Anemo Archon protect you.
{{Dialogue end}}
